section.p: You are knocked to the ground, expertly pinned, and given a vicious beating. Lose 2-12 Stamina points (the roll of two dice). If still alive, you are barely conscious of the nomads stripping you of your possessions. They leave your money, having no use for coinage.
By the time you can get to your feet, the nomads have ridden off. Their captive hangs dead in his bonds. Delete all possessions from your Adventure Sheet and .
